programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young woman accuses a celebrity plastic surgeon and his girlfriend of sexual assault, Benson and the team must determine if the woman was attacked or if it was a night of sex games gone wrong.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A serial rapist strikes again after two decades of silence, and SVU is determined to uncover the elusive criminal and bring justice to his many victims; Stone discovers that his father worked on the case before it went cold.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and the team investigate a father's murder after his teenage daughters call in a home burglary that turns into an attempted assault; when the team speaks with the medical examiner, the details don't add up.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson, Fin, Carisi and Rollins debate what they should and should not conjecture about a defendant's situation while waiting to testify at her murder trial.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and the team investigate the death of a prostitute at a brothel; they wonder if there was foul play or if this could be a case of a junkie who relapsed, turned to tricking, got depressed and committed suicide.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and the SVU investigate the death of a man they believe to be a pedophile; when they dig deeper, they realize things are not what they seem and that the case actually hits really close to home.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU pursues a suspect when a child is discovered in the trunk of an abandoned car.

programme.title: Sue Thomas F.B.Eye
programme.desc: The team works to convict a man who served five years in prison for killing an FBI agent.

programme.title: Sue Thomas F.B.Eye
programme.desc: Jack and Sue go under cover in a law firm.

programme.title: Sue Thomas F.B.Eye
programme.desc: Sue and Jack go under cover to investigate a possible mob connection in a murder that Sue's snitch witnesses.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan wakes up in the bathroom of her New Orleans motel room, bloodied and beaten with no memory of what happened.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: While examining a young girl's cancer, Brennan and Booth uncover a bone-smuggling ring.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Booth and Brennan's investigation of an apparent suicide of a protester in Arlington National Cemetery may lead to a military scandal.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan makes a shocking discovery while trying to identify a Jane Doe; Brennan tries to come to grips with her parents' past.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: After a deadly bombing overseas, the team pursues a global terrorist group -- and suffers an emotional loss.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs fights for his life on a Navy hospital ship, while DiNozzo and Joanna go to Shanghai to take down the Calling.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: When Gibbs asks the team to help DEA Agent Luis Mitchell with a case, DiNozzo makes a discovery about Gibbs' connection to the agent; Gibbs debuts a new look.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Hours after calling Gibbs about a possible case, a Marine is found dead in Quantico; McGee and Bishop pose as a married couple.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Vance returns to field duty -- with Gibbs as his partner -- when a murder investigation has a connection to a former NCIS agent incarcerated for stealing evidence.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: During an investigation, Abby is trapped in a pharmaceutical lab when armed men enter the building and take hostages.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: When a petty officer is murdered, the crime matches a local serial killer's method of operation; Delilah and McGee prepare to move in together.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A murder forces Ducky to disclose his participation in a secret society devoted to solving cold cases.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Insurgents in Sudan attack volunteer doctors -- including the man married to DiNozzo's ex-girlfriend, Jeanne Benoit.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A petty officer hoping to prove his innocence volunteers to be court martialed by NCIS if the team investigates his case; Jake and Bishop talk about their marital issues.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A sailor who lost two siblings -- Marines who were killed in the line of duty -- needs a bone marrow transplant; Bishop returns to Oklahoma for Thanksgiving.
